item.description:
Due to the growing popularity of Boston Bookcrossing Meetups, we have decided to expand to two meetings per month. In addition to our regular second-Tuesday meetups, there will be another meetup once every four weeks on a Saturday afternoon. This is the first installation of the Boston Bookcrossing Saturday Chapter.

Come for lunch, or come for coffee, but definitely come for the conversation. On the agenda is our regular book-themed schmoozing and smorgasbord of bookcrossing-registered books. (http://www.bookcrossi...) This location has free wi-fi, so if you forget to register your books or you're not sure how, you can register them on the spot. (Bringing books is optional.)

We're trying out this venue for our first Saturday Chapter, and may change it if necessary, so be sure to double-check the meeting location next time.

New members are always welcome!

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll have a small sign with the Ballycumber Bookcrossing logo
item.name: The Boston Bookcrossing March Meetup -- Saturday Chapter
